home.title: Where Tracks Come to Life
home.subtitle: Discover, Create, and Compete Like Never Before
home.description: Explore our wide variety of tracks â€“ choose the ones that match your style and adventurous spirit. Start your journey by exploring the tracks added by other users or contribute by adding new locations to our community!

createTracks.title: Create Your Tracks
createTracks.description: Share your favorite driving spots with the community. Mark locations or draw detailed routes on the map.

joinTracks.title: Join Track Sessions
joinTracks.description: Connect with track owners and join exciting driving sessions. Experience new tracks with fellow enthusiasts.

createEvents.title: Organize Events
createEvents.description: Create and host your own track days, competitions, or casual meetups. Bring the community together.

joinEvents.title: Participate in Events
joinEvents.description: Find and join exciting automotive events. From track days to championships, there's something for everyone.

discover.title: Discover New Routes
discover.description: Explore a growing collection of tracks and routes. Find hidden gems and popular spots in your area.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Keep track of your visited locations and participated events. Build your driving portfolio.

auth.name: Name
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.loginPrompt: Please log in or try again later.

tracks.title: Explore Tracks
tracks.beFirst: Be the first to create a track!
tracks.noMapData: No map data available for this track.
tracks.noAvailability: No availability information for this track.

form.tagHelper: Select up to 2 track type tags and up to 5 tags total
form.mapInstructions: Mark a location or draw a route on the map. At least one is required.
form.joiningDescription: This option allows users to send a request to join your track. You can specify any requirements (such as the car they will be driving) or leave it open for further contact.
form.joiningRequirementsPlaceholder: Specify any requirements for users who want to join your track (e.g., car specifications, experience level, etc.)
form.joiningRequirementsHelp: All users will still be able to contact you via the provided contact information.

validation.nameTooShort: Track name must be at least 5 characters long.
validation.nameTooLong: Track name is too long (maximum 100 characters).
validation.descriptionTooShort: Track description must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.descriptionTooLong: Track description is too long (maximum 15000 characters).
validation.locationTooShort: Track location must be at least 5 characters long.
validation.locationTooLong: Track location is too long (maximum 50 characters).
validation.imageRequired: At least one track image is required.
validation.tagsRequired: At least one tag is required.
validation.tooManyTrackTypeTags: You can only select up to 2 track type tags.
validation.tooManyTags: You can only select up to 5 tags total.
validation.tooManyImages: You can only upload up to 7 images
validation.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before continuing.
validation.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to create a track.
validation.availabilityRequired: Please add at least one availability slot
validation.saveDrawing: To save the drawing, please click the 'Save' icon on the map.
validation.geometryRequired: Please either place a marker or draw a track on the map

form.error: Failed to create track. Please try again.

errors.openTimeBefore: Opening time must be before closing time

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
